### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/Int16/SignedInteger-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init<T>(T)`](/documentation/swift/int16/init(_:)-409to)Creates a new instance from the given integer.[`init?<T>(exactly: T)`](/documentation/swift/int16/init(exactly:)-7l3f5)### [Type Properties](/documentation/Swift/Int16/SignedInteger-Implementations#Type-Properties)

[`static var isSigned: Bool`](/documentation/swift/int16/issigned)A Boolean value indicating whether this type is a signed integer type.[`static var max: Self`](/documentation/swift/int16/max)The maximum representable integer in this type.[`static var min: Self`](/documentation/swift/int16/min)The minimum representable integer in this type.
